com.google.cloud.compute

Class AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.compute.AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration, AttachedDisk.PersistentDiskConfiguration, AttachedDisk.ScratchDiskConfiguration
    Enclosing class:
    AttachedDisk

    public abstract static class AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Base class for AttachedDisk configuration. Use AttachedDisk.PersistentDiskConfiguration to attach an existing persistent disk. Use AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration to create a boot persistent disk to attach to the instance. Use AttachedDisk.ScratchDiskConfiguration to attach a scratch disk.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.InterfaceType
      Specifies the disk interface to use for attaching this disk, which is either SCSI or NVME.
      static class  AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.Type
      Specifies the type of the attached disk.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean autoDelete()
      Returns whether the disk should auto-delete when the instance to which it's attached is deleted.
      Boolean boot()
      Returns whether to use the attached disk as a boot disk.
      AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.InterfaceType getInterfaceType()
      Returns the interface to use to attach the disk.
      AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.Type getType()
      Returns the type of the attached disk.
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.Type getType()
        Returns the type of the attached disk.

      • getInterfaceType

        public AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.InterfaceType getInterfaceType()
        Returns the interface to use to attach the disk. If not specified, AttachedDisk.AttachedDiskConfiguration.InterfaceType.SCSI is used.

      • boot

        public Boolean boot()
        Returns whether to use the attached disk as a boot disk. If true the virtual machine will use the first partition of the disk for its root filesystem. If not specified, the disk is not used as a boot disk.

      • autoDelete

        public Boolean autoDelete()
        Returns whether the disk should auto-delete when the instance to which it's attached is deleted. If not specified, the disk is not deleted automatically.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
